summary: I'm Vijay Chavda, an Intelligent Automation Engineer with 3.9+ years of experience in RPA and AI-driven process automation using Automation Anywhere, UiPath, Python, and GenAI. I’m passionate about solving problems, optimizing workflows, and driving efficiency through intelligent solutions.

I build scalable automation systems that combine RPA with GenAI and LLMs (OpenAI) for smart data extraction and decision-making. I also work across web technologies like Django, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and deliver insights using Power BI.
I'm actively seeking new opportunities to apply my AI-powered automation skills, collaborate with innovative teams, and contribute to impactful digital transformation projects.

bullets: Built and deployed an Intelligent Incident Automation System (IIAS) using UiPath, Python, and GenAI
Automated incident workflows between Oracle Service Cloud and NetSuite, cutting manual effort by 70%
Created a Regex + GenAI-based Python framework for structured data extraction
Implemented smart classification and validation for invoice and card data
Developed 12+ bots using Automation Anywhere A360
Automated AP, reconciliation, and SAP tasks, saving ₹60 crore
Built reusable components and led user training
Supported dashboarding with Power BI and web tools
Created BRDs and assisted AA v11 to A360 migration
Tested bots and improved performance via feedback
Automated invoice/data entry, reducing manual effort by 20%

projects.title: Domestic Payment Processing
projects.overview: Developed and deployed an automated payment processing system that eliminated manual tasks, reduced errors, and ensured timely payments across auto, MSME, employee, insurance, and DEL categories.
contributions: Built RPA bots using Automation Anywhere A360 for end-to-end payment automation
Automated pre-checking rules like vendor blocking, user validation, and tax verification
Handled payment proposal generation, debit-credit adjustments, and error handling
Monitored bot performance and logged exceptions in SQL Server
Collaborated with Django and Power BI developers for web interface and reporting
achievements: Delivered project within 45 days with full compliance
Reduced manual errors by 40% via rule-based validation

projects.title: Duplicate Invoice Identification
projects.overview: Automated the detection of duplicate invoices in SAP to prevent fraud and reduce manual effort.
contributions: Built end-to-end solution using UiPath for invoice duplication checks
Extracted SAP data across 9 servers using FBL1N and consolidated in Excel
Uploaded cleansed data to SQL Server and applied 13 matching rules
Generated comparison files and automated same-day validation
Eliminated manual errors and reduced processing time
achievements: Saved ₹60 crore by preventing fraudulent payments
Reduced manual effort by 2 hours daily
Improved invoice accuracy and fraud prevention

projects.title: Intercompany Reconciliation System (ICR Tool)
projects.overview: Built a full-stack reconciliation system to automate intercompany financial matching across multiple entities.
contributions: Designed auto-matching (60%) and manual matching (40%) workflows
Automated SAP data extraction using FBL1N and FBL5N across 12 servers
Developed Django portal for manual reconciliation tasks
Created Power BI dashboards for real-time tracking
Applied 9 matching rules to reduce reconciliation time
Automated ICR number generation and ensured SQL-based validation
achievements: Reduced reconciliation time from 7–8 days to near real-time

projects.title: Intelligent Incident Automation System (IIAS)
projects.overview: Developed a touchless incident management system integrating Oracle Service Cloud and NetSuite using UiPath and GenAI for intelligent classification and automation.
contributions: Built UiPath bots integrated with Python and GenAI for incident parsing and classification
Automated incident retrieval, validation, and status updates across OSVC and NetSuite
Created a Regex + GenAI framework to extract invoice numbers, credit card details, and amounts
Implemented real-time verification and confirmation logging
Added error handling and logging for process resilience
achievements: Improved accuracy and speed of incident processing
Enabled seamless integration between desktop and web platforms
